Comment: Navarro is a true believer.  Lutnick seems to be a lapdog.  Bessent backed Trump because he wanted lower tax rates and deregulation.  He wasn't counting on the tariffs and is trying behind the scenes to reverse the policy.    Bessent is regarded as the proverbial grown up in the room.  If Bessent resigns as he reportedly was threatening to do over Trump's tariff policy, the markets will tank.    If Fed chairman Powell leaves, the markets will tank.    We basically have two people who are holding the US economy together.  This is what you get when you install a dimwitted schoolyard bully as president.
